name: Norwegian Confedration of Trade Unions
membership: Members of the European trade union confederation.
goal: LO is the largest trade union in Norway. The goal is to work for better working conditions for our members. We mainly do this at national Level. But as members of the EEA agreement we also need to follow closely the processes in the EU.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU policies concerning Labour market, energy, single market, competition rules and environmental issues.
